        public DiskBackedCollectionPartition<T> get()
        Description copied from interface: SinkFunc
        Return the data partition associated with this task instance. Specifically to be used for caching functionality.
        Returns:
        data partition - type remains unknown as the output of sunk data can be a different type than T. Example, caching gatherTlink,T -> Tuple<int, T> but the output would be T
